message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.DS 

The paper discusses the use of POMDPs for sequential decision making in uncertain environments, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the limitations of MDP-based POMDP solvers, which is relevant to robotics (cs.RO) and control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper uses the well-known tiger problem to demonstrate the sub-optimality of MDP-based POMDP solvers, which is a classic problem in decision theory and decision making (cs.DS).
